website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel construction and available in 3 color choices, this cup is durable and perfect for camping.
pros: Less fragile than its glass and porcelain counterparts
These cups are functional, durable, and come at a great price
cons: Paint on the outside can chip over time
Some also reported that stainless steel cups alter the taste of the espresso

customer_reviews.title: Coating Peels
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these less than two months ago and the black exterior coating started to peel off all of them last week. By now they are useless. I followed the instructions and always hand-washed them but it didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Warning these cups are TINY 2oz single shot espresso cups! Not really suited for a full cup of morning coffee. The good thing is this is exactly what I wanted! These are BEAUTIFUL and look great! The handles are welded on so no more dropping a 12 dollar pair and calling it a day! These are PERFECT and add to the beauty of my chrome Gaggia Classic! VERY VERY pleased! HIGHLY recommend! P.S. again these are tiny cups! Be sure that it is espresso shot cups that you want before purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Abdussalaam Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: The cups arrived on time and in perfect condition. I begin my day with a cup ...
customer_reviews.text: The cups arrived on time and in perfect condition. I begin my day with a cup of extra strong coffee and the size is just right. The added benefit of the cup keeping the liquid piping hot as I sip to completion is a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: GaryC

customer_reviews.title: Great Function, Lackluster Form
customer_reviews.text: The cups work great, but one of the handles was placed a little too high on the cup and thus had the paint scraped off of it somewhere along the manufacturing line. It is not a functional issue, but for the price, I would expect the handles to be attached correctly and look nice. Edit: I was quickly contacted by the seller and given four new, perfect cups. A great company!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Peck

customer_reviews.title: Cute but verrrry small
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with my Nespresso machine. They're cute and seem well made. Took off 1 star because they are just a tad on the small side - one shot fills it to the brim and you have to carry very carefully or it'll spill
customer_reviews.author: Erin C. Yu

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: They look so chicc!! My mom loved them. It was a gift for her new coffee set and she loved them. However, After so many washes the color is falling off. And it’s revealing the stainless steel. But we’re okay with it because it’s still matches her theme !
customer_reviews.author: neylis pardillo

customer_reviews.title: great value-- won't break like glass ones!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after breaking a glass espresso cup in the sink. These are stainless steel and I don't have to worry about dropping and breaking them. Perfect size and good value for the $$. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AndrewSR

customer_reviews.title: Elegant looking but came rusted!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, seems durable and very stylish. Unfortunately one came rusted! It makes me wonder how long it will take the others to rust.
customer_reviews.author: neichtec

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, good quality i know they are espresso cups but they are very small. So someone with big hands would think its a joke lol other than that very cute
customer_reviews.author: Olga Gehrke

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of three
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set, but i had to throw one away because it was corroded at the base of the handle, the paint was chipped off.
customer_reviews.author: Tasarla

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: bought these for friend that just got their own expresso machine. he really likes them. i thought the quality was nice too. don't expect a large size cup. remember these are not for a regular cup of coffee but for expresso, meaning they are small cups.
customer_reviews.author: SK in Cincinnati

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for a cappuccino. They are easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dain

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this purchase. These are exactly what I was looking for and I am very impressed with the quality. I would highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Micro cups
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Talk about a tiny tea set... I expected espresso cups, but not medicine cups.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Whitham

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. My only issue, hard to hold and a bit small. Single espresso only.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift and the recipient loves them! Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Love the stainless steel cups
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice and are easy to clean. I usage two at a time for double express. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the enameled versions, stick to stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: The cups are the perfect volume to hold a shot from my nespresso machine. The color is also very nice and I have gotten complimented on it. Sadly the enameling is very poor quality and has started chipping away, despite hand cleaning them with a soft sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Lokky

customer_reviews.title: To look at they are great but they literally feel like paper in your hand ...
customer_reviews.text: To look at they are great but they literally feel like paper in your hand and abd can't even hold them when you put a shot of espresso in them cuz the heat goes right through, don't buy them !!
customer_reviews.author: Ann F.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but ok
customer_reviews.text: Just cheap metal cups. Not insulated or anything. Cute gift but not what I wanted them for ...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Kornahrens

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase, many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little espresso cups! They are adorable! DO NOT PUT IN DISHWASHER! Hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made but colors way off.
customer_reviews.text: Color is wayyyy off. Perfect turquoise but not green like the photo. Nice size and shape. Easy to hold. Will work but don't like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Vitsbrekka

customer_reviews.title: We use every day
customer_reviews.text: They look great every one ok about it perfect size for a expreso I love it. Only thing the black start to pill off.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos shinosaki

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for my son to play with. They are very durable and I'm sure would be great for their actual purpose of holding delicious espresso! If they can withstand the antics of an almost 2 year old, I would definitely count on their durability as an actual espresso cup.
customer_reviews.author: Tanis Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Great espresso cup that won’t break.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these cups to go with auto espresso machine , they are a nice size , easy to hold with handle and wash well .
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. High quality. My Turkish coffee buddies are going to be jealous
customer_reviews.author: Michael  V

customer_reviews.title: Bad paint
customer_reviews.text: The pain to started at Flaking off after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.author: Justin Tyrrell

customer_reviews.title: These work great! It keeps the coffee hot but still allows ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great! It keeps the coffee hot but still allows you to touch the sides without burning you.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Super tiny!
customer_reviews.text: Super tiny. They look like cups used by kids to play. Not recommended for morning coffee.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They look amazing and are the perfect size for espresso shots
customer_reviews.author: Kay gonell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Caution, just hand wash so there will be no spots
customer_reviews.author: Stepfone

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional espresso cups
customer_reviews.text: Fun and functional espresso cups. Little works of art!! I love them. They shipped really fast and are perfect for a single shot of espresso.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cups. I make a latte every morning one cup holds a double shot from the machine with room to spare, so spilling is not an issue.They are cool to the touch, amazing because the espresso is so hot! Nice to serve to guests for after dinner shots or any time of day actually. They clean up bright and shiny new with soap and water, no scratching or staining. Think these will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Zig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: When they first arrived they appeared beautiful and well crafted. They were purchased to survive the Fire house, were glass cafe cups cannot survive. --- Well, red does not survive the Firehouse. I suspect there is a warning somewhere about not putting them in the dishwasher. Large areas of red have come off. Cups still work but I would stick to just buying the stainless steel ones. Ordered another set of stainless steel. Everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The metal has a very strong smell which makes the coffee taste really bad
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lubet

customer_reviews.title: VERY MINI cups
customer_reviews.text: they're really nice looking BUT very, very tiny!! they look like something from a child's tea set ... yes, I do realize that an espresso cup is small but this is the next step down from small
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: These cute little espresso shot cups and solid and functional. The double wall constructions keeps you from burning your fingers and the handle makes it easy to lift your pinky. The stainless steel also helps impart a clean crisp flavor profile to nespresso shots.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like them anyway so I returned them hassle free
customer_reviews.text: Short one cup during shipment. Didn't like them anyway so I returned them hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable cups
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift for a family member who is always breaking his ceramic ones. These should prove to be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: MVL

customer_reviews.title: Espresso cups for ants?
customer_reviews.text: I know espresso cups are small. I was going for small. But who is drinking out of these? I can't even get a finger through the handle. Are they espresso cups for ants?
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shot amount for your favorite espresso
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my NEW espresso machine I got for Xmas. They not only match, but are just the right size for a quick and accurate shot of espresso. The material is quality as well. I would highly recommend these for any espresso consieurre.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Solid Espresso Cup
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size, aesthetic, and overall usability for a home espresso setup. Their minimalist design fits the general feel of most bars/kitchens and they’re easy to maintain. Plus, the perfect size for a double shot from my machine. Can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Palmer

customer_reviews.title: We really love them!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these to catch double espresso shots (1oz each) and they are amazing. We used to use glass ones but we would break them on occasion. Not anymore. And they look great with our espresso machine. They don't get hot until we rinse them but that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: nevans

customer_reviews.title: So cute and practical!
customer_reviews.text: I love these espresso cups! They are cute, easy to hold (don’t get hot) and my kids can’t break it like they did with the other glass ones! Perfect height to fit under the espresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: These are small, sturdy cups. The black coating seems durable and they are very easy to clean. I grabbed an espresso pot and a few pieces of equipment to make Cafe Cubano at work. I make about 8 cups a day and these 4 cups are used and washed twice each day. I see no signs of wear on them thus far. Also, they can be held comfortably with steaming hot liquid in them.
customer_reviews.author: Niamakutaku

customer_reviews.title: i wish they were more easily stackable but other than that
customer_reviews.text: very very cute. i wish they were more easily stackable but other than that, i loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely finished and polished stainless vacuum insulated expresso cups to keep your java hot!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely finished and polished stainless vacuum insulated expresso cups to keep your java hot! Nice workmanship and smooth edges, surfaces, and handles.
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatic

customer_reviews.title: Silver Stainless Steel Double Wall
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use at my shop with my Nespresso Pixie machine. I did't buy the painted ones because of some of the reveiwers stating the paint comes off after washing... These ones are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute as pie
customer_reviews.text: Non breakable small cups I use for visiting children and keep the china espresso cups for grown ups. Nice gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Mother B

customer_reviews.title: Great Mugs; Need Better Heat retention
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Only issue is they don't retain heat very well. Other than that, they function just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tomp

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my son on Christmas and he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son on Christmas and he is enjoying these espresso cups very much.
customer_reviews.author: George P. King, II

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Ordered 3 more sets for family who loved them!
customer_reviews.author: NGV220

customer_reviews.title: Perfect espresso cups
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift and used my Cricut machine to add designs to them. They are very sleek and are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzers13

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cups add to the experience of having my expresso. I feel like I'm in a café. Exactly as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: These cups are great. We bought 4 sets of double walled glass espresso cups and broke them all. These are the perfect size and have the same functionality as the glass without the fragility. They are well made and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: AKH

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: A little cheap looking for what I was expecting. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Cruz

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL,  NOT GOOD ENOUGH FOR TEA/COFFEE CUP
customer_reviews.text: These are TOO small cups, holding these cups also very difficult for adults. Not good enough for tea/coffee, these are good enough for kids play toys.
customer_reviews.author: Sivaprasad Boddapati

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than glass for me as my glass set broke over a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Rosydoo

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small for espresso. Those toy cup are about right for a ristretto or a dollhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Gael LAMBERT

product_meta.title: Silver Stainless Steel Double Wall Espresso Cups, Set of 4, Small
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverWhat choose an Espresso Cup Set from Farnsworth & Lloyd? 

Farnsworth & Lloyd set out to build a set of espresso cups that were handsome, functional, durable, and affordable. After exploring the other espresso cup sets available we knew we could do better. We needed espresso cups that could look good and work well in the office or at home. The Demitasses had to be insulated, but not bulky or fragile. Finally, the set of espresso cups must be affordable without being cheap - something you could confidently purchase for yourself or offer as a gift. We think we have achieved that with the 2-ounce Farnsworth & Lloyd Stainless Steel Double Wall Espresso 4 Cup Set. 

Stylish Espresso Cups Available in sets of Red, Silver, or Black we offer an Espresso Cup Set designed to match any style. The Silver Espresso Cups look great at home, in a cafe, or at the office and can either blend in with a modern minimalist style or stand out as a conversation piece in a more traditional setting. Use without a saucer or mix and match with your existing favorites. 

Durable & Functional Silver Espresso Cups. The double wall silver espresso cups keep the heat or cold on the inside preventing burnt fingers or condensation. Unlike glass or ceramic these 18/0 Stainless Steel espresso cups can survive the occasionally drop or spill.

Note: These are single shot espresso cups, they have a maximum usable capacity of one-quarter cup (2 fluid ounces, sixty milliliters). Each cup has a diameter of two and one-eighth inches (2.125”, ~5.4cm) and a height of one and three-quarter inches (1.75”, ~4.4cm). . Hand wash only with warm water and gentle detergent.
feature_bullets: Set of four 1/4 C (Quarter Cup) capacity silver espresso cups in handsome gift box.
Durable stainless steel construction keeps contents warm without burning your hands.
Each stainless espresso cup measures 2 1/8 Inches Wide by 1 3/4 Inches High.
Condensation Free Design protects table tops and other surfaces.
Single shot Silver Demitasse has plenty of room for a small Ristretto, Normale, Doppio, Traditional Macchiato, or Cortado.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars192 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
